page.title: 03SCHOOL EDUCATION
page.content: Since June 1981 the children of the area have had a smart new building to work in.Before that they were taught in a school that had been used since May 28th 1877.The new building is modern with 5 classrooms built around a large hall which is used for drama P.E., games,assembly and dinner.The cloakrooms are off each classroom and there are toilets and washbasins there too. The old building had 5 classrooms, 2 were portable buildings built by the side of the playground. The children had to go outside to the toilets at the bottom of the playing field. Assembly was held in a classroom because there was no hall. P.E. had to be done in the classrooms too. Now the old school is falling into disrepair. The windows are broken and the playground is overgrown with weeds.
